A small correction: Boton is a design by Albert Boton. I believe Lange’s contribution is polish, at best.

Rather than matching Boton, it may be better to match the content. What is the subject of the book?

ok maybe i should ask what kind of ornaments can i match with an egyptienne font?  
anybody got an idea?
